    • Uses of RecommendedPointOfInterest in dataAccess

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RecommendedPointOfInterest PointDB.getPOIForId(long osmId)
      Gets the point of interest that matches the given id
      Methods in dataAccess that return types with arguments of type RecommendedPointOfInterest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<RecommendedPointOfInterest> PointDB.getPOIForId(long osmId, double latitude, double longitude, int radius)
      Gets the point of interest that matches the given id if it is in the specified radius from a given position.
      java.util.List<RecommendedPointOfInterest> PointDB.getPOIInRadius(double latitude, double longitude, int radius)
      Gets all points of interest in a specified radius from a given position (in coordinates) from the database

    • Uses of RecommendedPointOfInterest in recommender

      Methods in recommender that return types with arguments of type RecommendedPointOfInterest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<RecommendedPointOfInterest> Recommender.recommend(User user)
      Performs a recommendation using first collaborative filtering and then content-based filtering if not enough recommendations were produced before.
      java.util.List<RecommendedPointOfInterest> Recommender.recommendCollaborative(User user)
      Performs the collaborative filtering recommendation, based on user ratings.
      java.util.List<RecommendedPointOfInterest> Recommender.recommendContentBased(User user)
      Performs the content-based approach, based on the similarity between POI characteristics and user interests.
      java.util.List<RecommendedPointOfInterest> Recommender.recommendForCategory(User user, int categoryIndex)
      Performs a category-specific recommendation, so only points of interest are returned that match the given tourist category
